dc_title_s: Scarborough's map of Scotland, shewing counties, all railroad and steamship lines with distances between stations and landings
dc_description_s: Includes lists of Scotland burghs and civil counties with 1901 census data.; Includes table of travel distances.; Inset: Shetland and Orkney Islands.; "No. 331" in upper left.; "Printed by the Scarborough Company, Boston, U.S.A." in lower left.|91 x 101 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:443,520; 7 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
